mapper.select: SELECT NAME as INFO_NAME, VALUE as INFO_VAL, BANNER as ETC FROM v$version;

SELECT ATS.TABLE_NAME AS "NAME" , nvl(ATC.COMMENTS,'') AS "REMARKS"
FROM USER_TABLES ATS LEFT JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS ATC ON ATS.TABLE_NAME = ATC.TABLE_NAME where 1 = 1
FROM ALL_TABLES ATS LEFT JOIN ALL_TAB_COMMENTS ATC ON ATS.TABLE_NAME = ATC.TABLE_NAME and ATS.OWNER =ATC.OWNER where ATS.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and
ATS.TABLE_NAME in (${item})
ORDER BY ATS.TABLE_NAME

select atc.COLUMN_ID , atc.TABLE_NAME , atc.COLUMN_NAME , atc.DATA_TYPE , atc.CHAR_LENGTH as COLUMN_SIZE , atc.DATA_PRECISION as DATA_PRECISION , atc.DATA_SCALE as DECIMAL_DIGITS , atc.NULLABLE as IS_NULLABLE , atc.DATA_DEFAULT as COLUMN_DEF , nvl(ACC.COMMENTS,'') AS "COMMENT" ,(SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE) != MIN(P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE) THEN 'MUL' WHEN MAX(P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE) = 'P' THEN 'PK' WHEN MIN(P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE) = 'R' THEN 'FK' WHEN MIN(P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE) = 'U' THEN 'UNI' ELSE '' END
FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS D JOIN USER_CONSTRAINTS P ON D.TABLE_NAME = P.TABLE_NAME AND D.CONSTRAINT_NAME = P.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE IN ('P', 'R', 'U') where 1=1
FROM ALL_CONS_COLUMNS D JOIN ALL_CONSTRAINTS P ON D.owner = P.owner and D.TABLE_NAME = P.TABLE_NAME AND D.CONSTRAINT_NAME = P.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND P.CONSTRAINT_TYPE IN ('P', 'R', 'U') where D.owner = upper(#{schema})
and D.TABLE_NAME =atc.TABLE_NAME AND D.COLUMN_NAME =atc.COLUMN_NAME ) AS CONSTRAINTS
from USER_TAB_COLUMNS ATC left join USER_COL_COMMENTS acc on atc.TABLE_NAME = acc.TABLE_NAME and atc.COLUMN_NAME = acc.COLUMN_NAME where 1=1
from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS atc left join ALL_COL_COMMENTS acc on atc.TABLE_NAME = acc.TABLE_NAME and atc.COLUMN_NAME = acc.COLUMN_NAME and atc.OWNER = acc.OWNER where atc.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and
atc.TABLE_NAME in (${item})
order by ATC.TABLE_NAME , ATC.COLUMN_ID

SELECT ao.OBJECT_NAME AS "name" , nvl(atc.COMMENTS,'') AS "remarks"
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao LEFT JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS atc ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = atc.TABLE_NAME where 1=1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao LEFT JOIN ALL_TAB_COMMENTS atc ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = atc.TABLE_NAME and ao.OWNER =atc.OWNER where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and OBJECT_TYPE='VIEW' ORDER BY ao.OBJECT_NAME

select TBL.* , col.* from ( SELECT ao.OBJECT_NAME AS "TABLE_NAME" , nvl(ATC.COMMENTS,'') AS "REMARKS"
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao LEFT JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS atc ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = atc.TABLE_NAME where 1 =1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao LEFT JOIN ALL_TAB_COMMENTS atc ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = atc.TABLE_NAME and ao.OWNER =atc.OWNER where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and OBJECT_TYPE='VIEW'
and
ao.OBJECT_NAME in (${item})
ORDER BY ao.OBJECT_NAME ) tbl , ( select atc.COLUMN_ID , atc.TABLE_NAME , atc.COLUMN_NAME , atc.DATA_TYPE , atc.CHAR_LENGTH as COLUMN_SIZE , atc.DATA_PRECISION as DATA_PRECISION , atc.DATA_SCALE as DECIMAL_DIGITS , atc.NULLABLE as IS_NULLABLE , atc.DATA_DEFAULT as COLUMN_DEF , nvl(ACC.COMMENTS,'') AS "COMMENT"
from USER_TAB_COLUMNS atc left join USER_COL_COMMENTS acc on atc.TABLE_NAME = acc.TABLE_NAME and atc.COLUMN_NAME = acc.COLUMN_NAME where 1=1
from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS atc left join ALL_COL_COMMENTS acc on atc.TABLE_NAME = acc.TABLE_NAME and atc.COLUMN_NAME = acc.COLUMN_NAME and atc.OWNER = acc.OWNER where atc.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
order by atc.TABLE_NAME , atc.COLUMN_ID )col where tbl.TABLE_NAME = col.TABLE_NAME

SELECT OBJECT_NAME as NAME , OBJECT_TYPE as TYPE , CREATED as CREATED , STATUS as STATUS
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao WHERE 1=1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND OBJECT_TYPE='PROCEDURE' ORDER BY OBJECT_NAME

select procsb.OBJECT_NAME , procsb.OBJECT_TYPE , procsb.CREATED , procsb.STATUS , nvl(argsb.ARGUMENT_NAME ,'null') as ARGUMENT_NAME , argsb.DATA_TYPE , argsb.IN_OUT from ( SELECT OBJECT_NAME , OBJECT_TYPE , CREATED , STATUS
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao WHERE 1=1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND OBJECT_TYPE=UPPER(#{objectType}) ORDER BY OBJECT_NAME ) procsb left outer join ( SELECT object_name ,ARGUMENT_NAME , DATA_TYPE ,IN_OUT ,OVERLOAD
FROM USER_ARGUMENTS aa WHERE 1=1
FROM ALL_ARGUMENTS aa where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
) argsb on procsb.OBJECT_NAME = argsb.OBJECT_NAME ORDER BY procsb.OBJECT_NAME, OVERLOAD

SELECT AO.OBJECT_NAME , AO.OBJECT_TYPE , AO.CREATED , (CASE WHEN 'VALID' = NVL (ao.status, 'VALID') AND 'VALID' = ao.status THEN 'VALID' ELSE 'INVALID' END) AS STATUS
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao WHERE 1=1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND ao.OBJECT_TYPE = 'PACKAGE' ORDER BY AO.OBJECT_TYPE DESC, AO.OBJECT_NAME

select ap.OBJECT_NAME as packagename ,ap.PROCEDURE_NAME as name ,( select case when instr(upper(replace(text,chr(9),' ')), ' FUNCTION ') > 0 then 'FUNCTION' when instr(upper(replace(text,chr(9),' ')), ' PROCEDURE ') > 0 then 'PROCEDURE' else 'unknow' end from user_source where 1=1 and name = ap.object_name and upper(replace(text,chr(9),' ')) like '% '|| ap.procedure_name ||'%' and rownum <= 1 ) as type
FROM USER_PROCEDURES ap WHERE 1=1
FROM ALL_PROCEDURES ap where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and ap.OBJECT_NAME = upper(#{objectName})

SELECT OBJECT_NAME as NAME , OBJECT_TYPE as TYPE , CREATED as CREATED , STATUS as STATUS
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao WHERE 1=1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND OBJECT_TYPE='FUNCTION' ORDER BY OBJECT_NAME

SELECT ui.INDEX_NAME as NAME ,uc.STATUS
FROM USER_INDEXES ui left outer join USER_CONSTRAINTS uc ON ui.table_name = uc.table_name AND ui.index_name = uc.constraint_name where 1 =1 AND uc.status = 'ENABLED'
FROM ALL_INDEXES ui left outer join ALL_CONSTRAINTS uc ON ui.OWNER = uc.OWNER AND ui.table_name = uc.table_name AND ui.index_name = uc.constraint_name where ui.OWNER = upper(#{schema}) AND uc.status = 'ENABLED'
ORDER BY ui.table_name, ui.index_name

SELECT ao.OBJECT_NAME as NAME ,ao.OBJECT_TYPE as TYPE ,ao.CREATED , (CASE WHEN at.status = 'ENABLED' AND ao.status = 'VALID' THEN 'VALID' ELSE 'INVALID' END) AS STATUS
FROM user_objects ao INNER JOIN user_triggers at ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = at.TRIGGER_NAME where 1 =1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao left outer join ALL_TRIGGERS at ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = at.TRIGGER_NAME where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and ao.object_type = 'TRIGGER' ORDER BY at.table_name, ao.object_name

SELECT ao.OBJECT_NAME ,at.TABLE_NAME ,at.triggering_event AS EVENTTYPE ,at.when_clause AS TIMING ,ao.object_type AS TYPE ,ao.CREATED , (CASE WHEN at.status = 'ENABLED' AND ao.status = 'VALID' THEN 'VALID' ELSE 'INVALID' END) AS STATUS
FROM user_objects ao INNER JOIN user_triggers at ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = at.TRIGGER_NAME where 1 =1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao left outer join ALL_TRIGGERS at ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = at.TRIGGER_NAME where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and ao.object_type = 'TRIGGER' ORDER BY at.table_name, ao.object_name

SELECT OBJECT_NAME as NAME , OBJECT_TYPE as TYPE , CREATED as CREATED , STATUS as STATUS
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao INNER JOIN USER_SEQUENCES alls ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = alls.SEQUENCE_NAME where 1 =1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao left outer join ALL_SEQUENCES alls ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = alls.SEQUENCE_NAME where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and ao.object_type = 'SEQUENCE' ORDER BY ao.OBJECT_NAME

SELECT ao.OBJECT_NAME ,ao.CREATED ,ao.LAST_DDL_TIME ,ao.STATUS ,alls.MIN_VALUE ,alls.MAX_VALUE ,alls.INCREMENT_BY ,alls.CACHE_SIZE ,alls.CYCLE_FLAG ,alls.ORDER_FLAG ,alls.LAST_NUMBER
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao INNER JOIN USER_SEQUENCES alls ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = alls.SEQUENCE_NAME where 1 =1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao left outer join ALL_SEQUENCES alls ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = alls.SEQUENCE_NAME where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and ao.object_type = 'SEQUENCE' ORDER BY ao.OBJECT_NAME

SELECT ao.OBJECT_NAME ,ao.CREATED ,ao.LAST_DDL_TIME ,ao.STATUS ,alls.MIN_VALUE ,alls.MAX_VALUE ,alls.INCREMENT_BY ,alls.CACHE_SIZE ,alls.CYCLE_FLAG ,alls.ORDER_FLAG ,alls.LAST_NUMBER
FROM USER_OBJECTS ao INNER JOIN USER_SEQUENCES alls ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = alls.SEQUENCE_NAME where 1 =1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS ao left outer join ALL_SEQUENCES alls ON ao.OBJECT_NAME = alls.SEQUENCE_NAME where ao.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
and ao.object_type = 'SEQUENCE' and ao.OBJECT_NAME = #{objectName}

SELECT atc.TABLE_NAME , atc.COLUMN_NAME , atc.DATA_TYPE , atc.CHAR_LENGTH as COLUMN_SIZE , atc.DATA_PRECISION as DATA_PRECISION , atc.DATA_SCALE as DECIMAL_DIGITS , atc.NULLABLE , atc.CHAR_USED , USER OWNER , atc.DATA_DEFAULT
from USER_TAB_COLUMNS atc where 1=1
from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS atc where atc.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND atc.TABLE_NAME = #{objectName} ORDER BY atc.COLUMN_ID

SELECT acc.CONSTRAINT_NAME, acc.COLUMN_NAME
FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS acc , USER_CONSTRAINTS ac where acc.TABLE_NAME = ac.TABLE_NAME AND acc.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ac.CONSTRAINT_NAME
FROM ALL_CONS_COLUMNS acc , ALL_CONSTRAINTS ac WHERE acc.OWNER = ac.OWNER AND acc.TABLE_NAME = ac.TABLE_NAME AND acc.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ac.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND acc.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND acc.TABLE_NAME = #{objectName} AND ac.CONSTRAINT_TYPE in ('P') ORDER BY acc.POSITION

SELECT 'COMMENT ON TABLE ' || '${schema}' || '.' || C.TABLE_NAME || ' IS ''' || C.COMMENTS || ''';' AS COMMENT_TEXT
from USER_TAB_COMMENTS c where 1=1
FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS c where c.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL AND C.TABLE_NAME = #{objectName} UNION ALL SELECT 'COMMENT ON COLUMN ' || '${schema}' || '.' || C.TABLE_NAME || '.' || C.COLUMN_NAME || ' IS ''' || C.COMMENTS || ''';'
from USER_COL_COMMENTS c where 1=1
FROM ALL_COL_COMMENTS c where c.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL AND C.TABLE_NAME = #{objectName}

select COLUMN_NAME
from USER_TAB_COLUMNS c where 1=1
FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND TABLE_NAME = #{objectName} order by TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_ID

select TEXT as SOURCE_TEXT
from USER_VIEWS WHERE 1=1
from ALL_VIEWS where OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND VIEW_NAME = #{objectName} order by VIEW_NAME

SELECT b.text AS source_text
FROM user_objects a INNER JOIN user_source b ON a.object_name = b.name and a.OBJECT_TYPE = b.type WHERE 1 = 1
FROM ALL_OBJECTS a INNER JOIN ALL_SOURCE b ON a.object_name = b.name and a.OBJECT_TYPE = b.type where a.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND a.object_type =UPPER( #{objectType}) AND a.object_name =#{objectName}

SELECT object_type as TYPE
FROM user_objects WHERE 1 = 1
FROM all_objects WHERE OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND object_name = UPPER (#{objectName})
AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT aic.COLUMN_POSITION , ai.INDEX_NAME , ai.TABLE_NAME , ai.INDEX_TYPE , ai.TABLE_OWNER , ai.UNIQUENESS , ai.BUFFER_POOL , aic.DESCEND , aic.COLUMN_NAME , aie.COLUMN_EXPRESSION
FROM USER_INDEXES ai INNER JOIN USER_IND_COLUMNS aic ON ai.INDEX_NAME = aic.INDEX_NAME AND ai.TABLE_NAME = aic.TABLE_NAME LEFT JOIN USER_IND_EXPRESSIONS aie ON 1 = 1 AND aie.INDEX_NAME = aic.INDEX_NAME AND aie.TABLE_NAME = aic.TABLE_NAME AND aie.COLUMN_POSITION = aic.COLUMN_POSITION WHERE 1 = 1
FROM ALL_INDEXES ai INNER JOIN ALL_IND_COLUMNS aic ON ai.OWNER = aic.INDEX_OWNER AND ai.INDEX_NAME = aic.INDEX_NAME AND ai.TABLE_NAME = aic.TABLE_NAME LEFT JOIN ALL_IND_EXPRESSIONS aie ON 1 = 1 AND aie.INDEX_OWNER = aic.INDEX_OWNER AND aie.INDEX_NAME = aic.INDEX_NAME AND aie.TABLE_NAME = aic.TABLE_NAME AND aie.COLUMN_POSITION = aic.COLUMN_POSITION where ai.OWNER = upper(#{schema})
AND aic.INDEX_NAME = UPPER( #{objectName}) ORDER BY aic.COLUMN_POSITION

SELECT ua.position AS "order" ,ua.argument_name AS name ,DECODE (ua.data_type, 'REF CURSOR', 'SYS_REFCURSOR', ua.data_type) AS rdbtype ,ua.in_out AS type ,ua.data_length AS length ,ua.default_value as value FROM user_arguments ua WHERE 1=1 AND ua.object_name = UPPER (#{objectName}) AND ua.in_out in ('IN','IN/OUT') AND ua.argument_name > ' ' and nvl(ua.package_name,'null') = case when #{package_name} is null then 'null' else UPPER (#{package_name}) end ORDER BY ua.object_name, ua.overload, ua.sequence

SELECT ua.position AS "order" ,ua.argument_name AS name ,DECODE (ua.data_type, 'REF CURSOR', 'SYS_REFCURSOR', ua.data_type) AS rdbtype ,ua.in_out AS type ,ua.data_length AS length ,null as value FROM user_arguments ua WHERE 1=1 AND ua.object_name = UPPER (#{objectName}) AND ua.in_out in ('OUT', 'IN/OUT') AND ua.argument_name > ' ' and nvl(ua.package_name,'null') = case when #{package_name} is null then 'null' else UPPER (#{package_name}) end ORDER BY ua.object_name, ua.overload, ua.sequence
